* Diana watched as Rion ran along, trying to get into the air.
She wondered if he would be able to master the flight of his beast mode so 
soon after getting it, leaving her behind to still learn how to climb and 
even roar.
Rion always had leanred things faster then her, she had always thought that 
she was rather slow in the head. Not really getting things until it had been 
explained to her several times.
Diana watched him take off, running alongside. And, of course, she was left 
to run!
She then remembered the small dove wings at her back, flapping them and only 
coming out with a cooled back and a fluttering sound. Diana narrowed her 
eyes in frustration. < at least I can impersonate a moter boat...>
She did a little hop, skip and a jump at Rion's tail feathers before 
settling beside him again.*

" Okay! But we should follow our noses too. I can't smell any metal around 
here and I always could on the Delta."
